name: Nuclear Dance
description:
My entry for WGJ 90

!README! The beep the plays when a collision is predicted is supposed to be looping. For some reason, this is broken in the web build and I didn't have time to do a workaround. If this bothers you, try the standalone version. !README!

Rotate satellite orbits to crash them into other satellites

Controls:

RMB + drag - rotate camera

LMB + drag - rotate orbit

SPACE - stun the nuclear satellites (usable after a stun satellite spawns)

Mouse wheel - zoom in/out

Assets were obtained from the Unity asset store, opengameart.org and other similar sources.

Music by Kevin MacLeod

Lightless Dawn by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
